    • About Patty Gillepsie


    Patty considers herself a compassionate person, and that shows in her work. She takes the time to listen to clients to help them find the perfect real estate opportunity to meet their needs, whether that means selling their current home so that they may find their dream home or coaching buyer specialists on her team to assist in finding the perfect purchase opportunity for clients. The Patty Sells NC Team sole goal is to build a real estate business that provides unmatched customer service by way of effective communication and expert counsel to every single client.
